title: Business Analyst
description:
Skills:
Business Analysis, Deliverable, Documentation, User Stories, Product Management, Product Development, Product Road Mapping, User Acceptance Testing,

Responsibilities


Gathering, documenting, and analysing business and user requirements for crypto exchange.
Collaborating with stakeholders to define project scope, goals, and deliverables.
Conducting market and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for product improvement or new product development.
Creating and maintaining detailed project documentation, including feature specifications, user stories, and process flows.
Facilitating communication and collaboration between different teams involved in software development, such as product management, development, and quality assurance.
Identifying and addressing issues and risks that may impact project scope, timeline, or budget.
Participating in user acceptance testing and providing feedback to the development team.
Supporting the product management team in strategic planning, product roadmap development, and prioritization of features and enhancements.
Monitoring and analysing product usage data to identify patterns and trends that can inform product decisions.
Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in software development and product management.


Qualifications

Qualifications:


1-2 years of experience as a business analyst.
Demonstrated strong written and verbal communication
Functional requirement gathering, documenting, technical requirements for system implementation.
Working knowledge of product development life cycle.
Essential Attributes:
Positive attitude, team player, and readiness for challenges.
